api_list.api_description: Retrieve information about a journal by its ISSN.
Parses a wiki page and returns its HTML content.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Title of the page to parse.

optional_parameters.name: wiki
optional_parameters.description: The wiki endpoint to use. Defaults to English Wikipedia.

query: Can you give me the details of the journal with ISSN 0028-0836 and also provide the Wikipedia page content for Nature journal?
